meanings.sent1: The acarboses were used to treat diabetes in the patients.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed acarboses to control blood sugar levels.
meanings.sent3: The acarboses gathered on the pharmacy shelf, waiting to be dispensed.
meanings.sent4: The acarboses in the medicine cabinet were like tiny soldiers fighting against high glucose.
meanings.sent5: The sweet taste of acarboses made the medicine more palatable for the children.

meanings.definition: Acarboses: third person singular present of acarbose
meanings.sent1: She acarboses every morning to manage her blood sugar.
meanings.sent2: He acarboses regularly to keep his diabetes under control.
meanings.sent3: The cat acarboses around the house, looking for hidden treats.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden acarboses towards the sunlight for energy.
meanings.sent5: The student acarboses diligently to understand the complex topic.
